entry.def: If you skip along, you move almost as if you are dancing, with a series of little jumps from one foot to the other.

example.ex: They saw the man with a little girl skipping along behind him...
example.tran: 他们看见那个男人身后还跟着一个蹦蹦跳跳的小姑娘。

example.ex: We went skipping down the street arm in arm...
example.tran: 我们挽着胳膊，蹦蹦跳跳地走在大街上。

entry.def: When someone skips, they jump up and down over a rope which they or two other people are holding at each end and turning round and round. In American English, you say that someone skips rope .

example.ex: Outside, children were skipping and singing a rhyme...
example.tran: 外面孩子们一边跳绳一边唱着歌。

example.ex: They skip rope and play catch, waiting for the bell.
example.tran: 他们又是跳绳，又是玩接球，等着上课铃声响起。

entry.tran: 不做，不参加(常做或大多人都做的事)
entry.def: If you skip something that you usually do or something that most people do, you decide not to do it.

example.ex: It is important not to skip meals...
example.tran: 每顿饭都要吃，这一点非常重要。

entry.def: If you skip or skip over a part of something you are reading or a story you are telling, you miss it out or pass over it quickly and move on to something else.

example.ex: You might want to skip the exercises in this chapter...
example.tran: 你们也许想跳过这一章的练习。

example.ex: She reinvented her own life story, skipping over the war years when she had a German lover.
example.tran: 她重新杜撰了自己的生平，略掉了在战争年代有过一个德国情人的经历。

entry.def: If you skip from one subject or activity to another, you move quickly from one to the other although there is no obvious connection between them.

example.ex: She kept up a continuous chatter, skipping from one subject to the next.
example.tran: 她从一个话题扯到另一个话题，一直喋喋不休。

entry.def: A skip is a large, open, metal container which is used to hold and take away large unwanted items and rubbish.

auth_sentence.content: Yet the article skips over that minor fact.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yet the article skips over that minor fact.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yet the article skips over that minor fact.

auth_sentence.content: So it seems the EV skips an unneccesary and costly step.
auth_sentence.res_content: So it seems the EV skips an unneccesary and costly step.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: So it seems the EV skips an unneccesary and costly step.

auth_sentence.content: Teleport skips the computer login, so it feels less secure.
auth_sentence.res_content: Teleport skips the computer login, so it feels less secure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Teleport skips the computer login, so it feels less secure.
